features: Powerful & fast: 1600 Watts of power with 26 Grams/Min. of steam and ready to use in just 40 seconds. Steam your clothes in no time!.

Easy to Use: Rowenta steamers work great with regular tap water. Fill the removable 6.76 oz tank directly from the sink and steam for up to 10 minutes continuously. Lightweight and portable, perfect for everyday steaming needs.
Versatile: clean and refresh your whole household including curtains and furniture with ease.
Heated Metal Faceplate: easily iron away any stubborn wrinkles with the heated metal faceplate.

Steam any fabric: delicate, large, or thick with different modes of steaming and high steam power, this steamer can dewrinkle and sanitize any type of fabric: Cotton/Wool/Poly/Silk/Linen/Nylon, even suits or jackets.

You have used descaling chemicals or additives in the water. Never add such products to the water tank. These contain organic waste or minerals that condense under the influence of heat and cause spitting, brown dripping or premature aging of your appliance.
body.description: Enjoy fast, efficient steam day after day with Rowenta X'cel Steam+, the powerful handheld steamer for efficient use on a wide range of fabrics. Boasting 1600 W of power and continuous steam on demand, it ensures excellent results, with 20 g/min of steam flow on Delicate level and 26 g/min on Super Turbo level. A cast aluminum heating plate with ceramic coating provides better results than ever, while a quick heat up of just 40 seconds means X'cel Steam+ is ready when you are. Thanks to the steamer's revolutionary design and heated soleplate technology, it removes wrinkles in a single vertical movement, with no need for an ironing board perfect for last minute and on the go steam sessions. It can even be used to refresh and sanitize your home. Rounding it all off are convenient features including a 190 ml removable water tank for long steaming sessions and easy refills, as well as an extra long 3 m cord and steam locker for total freedom of movement. Plus, four smart accessories provide added ease of use: a fabric brush for easy use on heavy fabrics, a steam bonnet for use on delicate fabrics, a door hook to easily hang your clothes for steaming, and a crease attachment for perfect creases on jackets or pants. Power cord storage - Velcro,Water tank capacity - 200 ml,Power cord length - 3 m,Heat-up time - 40 S.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rowenta Xcel Plus Hand-held steamer Enjoy fast, efficient steam day after day with Rowenta X'cel Steam+, the powerful handheld steamer for efficient use on a wide range of fabrics.

Features Ready in NO Time 1600 Watts of power makes this steamer ready in 40 seconds ! No more waiting to look great. 2 Steam levels Turbo level and Delicate level gives you the option to choose the steam output level depending on your fabric. Turbo mode has more steam output to take the wrinkles off a heavy fabric. Use at any angle! With the heated soleplate, there will be no condensation and you can use it both in horizontal as well as vertical motion.

Features Multipurpose use Due to its 9.5 ft long cord use it to steam your drapes, couches , pet-beds etc. Refresh and sanitize your home with Rowenta Xcel Plus. Ease of Use Convenient features including a 190 ml removable water tank for long steaming sessions and easy refills, steam locker for total freedom of movement and a sturdy base. Accessories - Fabric brush. - Steam bonnet. - Door hook. - Crease attachment.

What Make Rowenta Garment care solutions Better? Steam: Rowenta offers unique steam distribution across the entire soleplate for better steam penetration and more efficient ironing. Heat: Rowenta soleplates have a thick central core of aluminum that ensures quick and even heat distribution across the entire soleplate, no hot spots! Glide: Rowenta soleplates are made from the highest quality stainless steel to allow for a maximum glide across all fabrics and reduce efforts. Water: Rowenta irons are designed to use regular untreated tap water without spitting or leaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer heats up quickly and does a nice job to get rid of wrinkles fast. This has a nice capacity and lasts a long time. Cons would be that the front plate takes a long time to cool down, so be careful when putting away. Also it is quite heavy. This was fatiguing on the wrist after a bit of steaming. Also the steam lock button is handy to keep the steam constantly going, but it is very easy to unlock. I found it easier to just hold down the steam button manually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and light weight
reviews.reviewText: Unit is compact, light weight. Very small reservoir. Not as powerful in emitting steam as some others I’ve owned. Unit started spitting brown gunk out on a white top second time to use it. CS was great at walking me through the steps to clean the unit while on the phone, but top was ruined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but mighty!
reviews.reviewText: I owned a Rowenta full-size steamer for 6 years, but it finally started stopped working efficiently. I realized that it was time for a new one, but really preferred a more compact version due to our small space. My husband surprised me with this one for Christmas and it was just was I was looking for! It's compact but powerful enough to steam all my sweaters and dress pants. I really don't enjoy getting out the iron and ironing board if I can avoid it. So far, this has replaced my need to do that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This steamer worked great for the few times I used it, then stopped
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Rowenta steamer almost 3 years ago, and it was a wonderful steamer for the times that I used it. I followed the manual instructions exactly, and although I took care to empty the tank, used distilled water since my tap water is hard, and treated it carefully, it just quit working. It no longer produces steam and the instructions have no other trouble shooting solutions that work. I tried to find more info on the Rowenta site and wanted to see if there was another solution or a way to get it repaired because I was happy with how it worked when it was functioning. There was not a way to get additional support, and after looking at other reviews, I found several with the same complaint that it stopped working suddenly. Do NOT buy this unit. Find something else as this seems to be a common issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love the steamer, easy to use and very versatile to use on trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Well made. Good purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: … but mine leaks if it’s the least bit non- perpendicular…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: This comes with a US plug, so you can’t use it in the UK
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried to explain it to their customer services, but they don’t seem to understand that it is actually a criminal offence to sell electrical equipment in the UK without a UK plug. Hopefully this review will prompt someone to have a look at the Law!

First off, I bought this steamer to replace a series of cheaper ones that I’d been using and replacing nearly yearly. First impression out of the box was that this was much nicer, more robust and heavy duty.I did notice water condensation in the tank when I first opened the box. My husband pointed out that they probably test it at the factory. Lo and behold, it said this in tiny print on the box. So, it wasn’t used but just quality-controlled!Using the steamer was really nice compared to my previous ones. I like the on/off button and auto shut-off for when I step away. I’m quite keen on the bubbling sound it makes when I steam, as I know it’s drawing on the water reservoir and it sounds like a friendly kettle. The unit is a bit heavier on account of its better construction, but that doesn’t phase me for normal daily use. For travel, it would be a bit bulky/heavy and I’d consider purchasing a smaller/folding travel version instead.I would recommend this steamer as well as Roweta products. I also have an iron which I adore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product is sold by amazon.co.uk but comes with US plug. Also it states on the cable that it accepts 120V and does not mention anything about 220V. So using a simple plug converter will not work most likely as UK voltage is 220.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but did not last longer than 2 years.
reviews.reviewText: This is my favourite steamer. Works very well but after 2 years it stopped working completely. I made sure I followed all the handles and care well, now it’s time to get a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve used max 4 times, started leaking water on turbo use, disappeared and cannot return, not cheap team.
